assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Maeda Kosen Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells civil engineering materials, construction materials, agricultural materials, and nonwoven fabrics in Japan. It operates through three segments: Social Infrastructure Business, Industry Infrastructure Business, and Human Infrastructure Business. The company manufactures and sells anti-animal products and agricultural materials; designs, constructs, and sells horticultural greenhouses and cultivation systems; and sells dairy farming products. It also manufactures and sells awnings, canvas fabric products, and marine civil engineering products; waterproofs exterior walls; and fish meal and oil. In addition, the company's products include embankment reinforcement materials, civil engineering sheets, river bank protection materials, slope disaster prevention products, adhesive anchors, water pollution prevention membranes, plastic artificial trees, drainage materials, polymer cement mortars, vegetation products, and thinned wood products. Further, its products include flat display panels used in clean rooms; wiping cloths for precision equipment; name ribbons, narrow woven, and knitted secondary products, such as various industrial fibers; and circular knitted products for clothing and various industrial materials. Furthermore, the company manufactures high-end forged wheels, and supplies OEMs to automobile manufacturers and sells them to the aftermarket; and develops, manufactures, and sells medical devices, as well as rents civil engineering materials. Maeda Kosen Co., Ltd. was founded in 1918 and is headquartered in Sakai, Japan.
